title: Found: The missing ingredient to grow blood vessels

title_detail.value: Found: The missing ingredient to grow blood vessels

summary: Researchers have discovered an ingredient vital for proper blood vessel formation that explains why numerous promising treatments have failed. The discovery offers important direction for efforts to better treat conditions ranging from diabetes to heart attacks and strokes.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have discovered an ingredient vital for proper blood vessel formation that explains why numerous promising treatments have failed. The discovery offers important direction for efforts to better treat conditions ranging from diabetes to heart attacks and strokes.
